|eth_chip3_brand=Intel |eth_chip3_model=WGI211AT |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Hardware Monitoring IC;Novoton;NCT7802Y;;1;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17304Q3;;1;,,, 25V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD16414Q5;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17507Q5A;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel NexFET Power CPU/1-Phase GPU) SVID, D-CAP+ Step-Down Controller for IMVP-7 Vcore;TI;TPS59641;;1;,,, PWM DC/DC Controller for GPU Core-Voltage Regulator;Renesas;ISL95870B;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Voltage Regulator;GlobalTech;GS1117AX;;1;,,, 3-lane, 3-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8603;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, VGA out, power switch, metal case, heat sink |stock_boot=Bios;American Megatrends;5.009; |stock_os=Linux;3.12.74;Sophos UTM 9.5; |oui_eth=00:1A:8C }} {{TagLine|Sophos SG 115 UTM Firewall}} :[https://community.sophos.com/utm-firewall Support page]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel Atom]]'' Dual-Core (@1.75GHz) *Memory: 4GB DDR3L (SODIMM) RAM *Storage: 8MB Quad SPI Flash, :64GB Transcend SATA SSD *Network: 4x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 3.33A via barrel
